TopicTitle: [PS4] Going into EVA combines all stages into one group

Articles.Content:
If you EVA it groups all of your staging into one big group. Very annoying when you forget about it and activate all parachutes and decouplers at once.

Edited June 4, 2017 by sumghai
Changed thread title to something more informative and removed unnecessary comment

Hi Solis, I play on a PS4 and have this problem too. My best suggestion is be sure to check your staging when reentering your command vehicle, I have tried a lot of different ideas to fix this, none of them worked. This should be patched in the update coming soon!
